intro: Use pushbutton to start and reset the timer

build.steps: Place the pushbuttons, 220 ohm resistors and buzzer on the breadboard

steps: 1.Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the positive rail of the breadboard
2.Connect a jumper wire from the positive to one side of the pushbutton
3.Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
4.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to one side of R1
5.Connect a jumper wire from D12 to one side of R1
1.Connect a jumper wire from positive rail to one side of the pushbutton
2.Connect a jumper wire from D13 to one side of R2
3.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to one side of R2
1.Connect a jumper wire from D2 to positive side of the buzzer
2.Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative of the buzzer
3.Run the project and then go to the Play Section
